Package javelin.model.unit.skill

Class Perception

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.skill.Skill
      • javelin.model.unit.skill.Perception
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Perception
extends Skill
    A mix of Search, Spot and Listen. Only use directly for basic perception rolls that don't depent on Weather, Javelin.getDayPeriod(), flying or similar modifiers.
    See Also:
    Squad.perceive(boolean, boolean, boolean), Combatant.perceive(boolean, boolean, boolean), Serialized Form
